99138.「いらっしゃいませ～。\n こちらは まとめ屋タバネちゃんですよ～。\n 本日は:
Hi, welcome. I'm Tabane and this is the
Summary Shop. How can I help you today?
<break>

99141.「<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>ちゃんで\n よろしいですか～？:
Is the wittle <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>
what you want?
<yesno><break>

99144.「他にも ほしい子は いますでしょうか～？\n<break>:
Is there anything else you want?
<break>

99145.「あら～ <%sL_BAG_NAME>がいっぱいで\n <%sM_item><%:
Hey, it looks like your <%sL_BAG_NAME> is too
full to hold the <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>.
<bw_break>

99212.「まとめアイテムは そのアイテムの種類と\n 同じ種類の あなたが手に入れたこと:
A summary item is an item that can transform into any item you've ever owned of the same type as the item itself. If you're Chameleon
Umbrella, the type is... So you can transform into any kind of umbrella you've ever owned. Likewise, if you have a Certificate of
Versatility, you can transform into any of the certificates of your profession. You can find out which items you have acquired by
checking the Senreki Fashionable Catalog...

99215.「他に ご用はありますか～？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

100170.「はじめまして～。\n 私は まとめ屋のタバネちゃんです～。\n<br>\n「整:
Hello. I'm Tabane-chan, the organizer... I'm inspired by Sasarana, the Tidy Master, and I've been developing my own collection items,
and I've come up with some really great ones... I'll tell you how amazing they are... they can transform into the same kind of
items you've already got! If you're a chameleon umbrella girl, the type is... So you can transform into any kind of "umbrella"
you've ever had, anytime, any number of times... In the same way, if you're a universal proof, you can transform into any
kind of "profession proof" you've ever had. We want to spread the word about how amazing these girls are, so we're giving them away
for free to adventurers... That's why...
